mapper.insert: INSERT INTO course_of_pregnancy( serial_no, exam_date, week_of_pregnancy_w, week_of_pregnancy_d, height_of_uterus, circumference_of_abdomen, weight_before_pregnancy, weight, blood_pressure_systolic, blood_pressure_diastolic, edema, protein_in_urine, sugar_in_urine, other_examinations, special_notes, name_of_medical_institution_or_doctor ) VALUES( #{serial_no}, to_date(#{exam_date}, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), #{week_of_pregnancy_w}, #{week_of_pregnancy_d}, #{height_of_uterus}, #{circumference_of_abdomen}, #{weight_before_pregnancy}, #{weight}, #{blood_pressure_systolic}, #{blood_pressure_diastolic}, #{edema}, #{protein_in_urine}, #{sugar_in_urine}, #{other_examinations}, #{special_notes}, #{name_of_medical_institution_or_doctor} )
mapper.update: UPDATE course_of_pregnancy SET exam_date = to_date(#{exam_date}, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), week_of_pregnancy_w = #{week_of_pregnancy_w}, week_of_pregnancy_d = #{week_of_pregnancy_d}, height_of_uterus = #{height_of_uterus}, circumference_of_abdomen = #{circumference_of_abdomen}, weight_before_pregnancy = #{weight_before_pregnancy}, weight = #{weight}, blood_pressure_systolic = #{blood_pressure_systolic}, blood_pressure_diastolic = #{blood_pressure_diastolic}, edema = #{edema}, protein_in_urine = #{protein_in_urine}, sugar_in_urine = #{sugar_in_urine}, other_examinations = #{other_examinations}, special_notes = #{special_notes}, name_of_medical_institution_or_doctor = #{name_of_medical_institution_or_doctor} WHERE id = #{id}
